entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
